plot: When a spoiled British pop star is sent to the hospital before his first big tour, he meets a girl who gets him to see himself in a new light.
title: Pop Star
plot_es: When a spoiled British pop star is sent to the hospital before his first big tour, he meets a girl who gets him to see himself in a new light.
plot_en: When a spoiled British pop star is sent to the hospital before his first big tour, he meets a girl who gets him to see himself in a new light.
